Posts.EditableText: is quest still not accessible with a screenreader such as NVDA?
Posts.HTML: is quest still not accessible with a screenreader such as NVDA?

Posts.EditableText:
The online version of Quest is accessible for NVDA, and I've tested it on Windows 10 and 11. However; I am using a Linux computer to use Quest. Try using with NVDA,--if you have a Windows version installed.
Also, I am working with a game that is going to be accessible for screen-reader users who wanted to play my games.
Posts.HTML:
